section.title: Description
section.p: This tool allows you to get the heartbeat status on demand for remote members and their components.

row.entry: Displays the status of the local site and the status of the remote sites declared in the network topology.

section.p: The tools output shows what each site in NCC knows via the configured topology.

section.p: The following table describes the tool's output.

entry.p: Whether the site is in or out of service as per the heartbeat algorithm.
The number of missed heartbeats since the last successful heartbeat over the OAM network.
The number of missed heartbeats since the last successful heartbeat over the Diameter network.

An integer value, 0 or greater, unless the local site or the site polled do not have a Diameter heartbeat, in which case the value is N/A. For instance, a stand-alone SM would not have a Diameter heartbeat.
The number of seconds since the last successful heartbeat with the named site. At least one of OAM or Diameter heartbeat.
An integer value, 0 or greater, in seconds, in the format of nn s ago.
The number of seconds since the last attempt to poll the site for its status.
An integer value, 0 or greater, in seconds, in the format of nn s ago.
